name: Soulshifting
description:
"It´s time to leave this place" 

After a long time underground, two souls (one human and one ghost) decide to get to the surface and say goodbye to the dark cave they were living in.

                                              

Both of the characters can be controlled separatly.

While you can walk and jump as a human, the ghost can fly trough the cave, searching for things you can´t reach otherwise. 

Help them to  reach their goal by switching characters like you think would be necessary and get to the last stage: the surface.

This game is part of the first semester project of the htk academy
